TopicTitle: Apollo 11 - PDI to touchdown. Subtitles and all!

Articles.Content:
Here\'s some great official footage for those of you who want to see what a real moon (mun) landing looks like without having seen this before today. It is a great reel of 16mm footage from the Eagle as the landing happens. Film begins at the 10% ignition on the PDI all the way until landing and Neil\'s famous line. Everything is captioned.

CAPCOM is Charlie Duke.

CDR: Neil Armstrong

LMP: Buzz Aldrin

CMP: Michael Collins.

All the stuff you\'ve probably read about can be heard in their voice transmissions.

EDIT

You\'ll hear them talking about AGS a lot. 'Abort Guidance System'. PGNS is the 'Primary Guidance and Navigation System'
Great video. I highly recommend people to try the AMSO mod for Orbiter, it really gives you an idea of which procedures the Apollo crew used during landing.

Great video. I highly recommend people to try the AMSO mod for Orbiter, it really gives you an idea of which procedures the Apollo crew used during landing.

Agreed.

I never saw the apollo 11 live, but damn! this vid was good! maybe i can stop holding my breath! XD

I was one of those guys about to turn blue like Charlie says. haha

Armstrong, Aldrin, Duke (MCC)

'Contact light!... Ok, Engine Stop..'

'ACA out of detent'

'Out of Detent, Auto.'

'Mode Control, both Auto, Descent Engine command over-ride off... Engine Arm off...

413 is in...'

'We copy you down, Eagle'

'Houston, Tranquility Base, here... The Eagle has landed.'

'Roger, Twan-Tranquility, you got a bunch of guys about to turn blue down here, thanks a lot!

'Thank you.'

'We\'re going to be busy here for a minute.'
